title: September Sea
medium: watercolor on paper mounted on board
credit_line: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Andrew Wyeth [1917-2009]; William Macbeth Gallery, Inc., New York, NY; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, 1953 until February 14, 1987 [1]; Mrs. James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, until April 23, 1993; bequest of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1994 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Bought from the 1953 Annual Exhibition of Contemporary American Sculpture, Watercolors and Drawings, no. 139 (see Mrs. Beal's original collection card in curatorial file.) 
[2]. Mrs. Beal mentions the watercolor as being in storage at Carnegie Institute in a letter dated October 27, 1956.

Updated and under review by CGK.

creator.birth_place: Chadds Ford (Delaware county, Pennsylvania, United States)
creator.death_place: Chadds Ford (Delaware county, Pennsylvania, United States)
